item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2016/07/two-tone-preservation/#comment-398037">Albert</a>.
Me too! I did do some second guessing after I went through with it, but now I'm totally for it. It's rad.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Albert.

Me too! I did do some second guessing after I went through with it, but now I’m totally for it. It’s rad.

item.title: By: Albert
item.dc:creator: Albert
item.description: Really glad you decided to go with the two tone, super rad. Can't wait to see this in person.
item.content:encoded: Really glad you decided to go with the two tone, super rad. Can’t wait to see this in person.

item.title: By: Eric

item.description:

Thanks! Trying to keep it period correct with this one.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Andrew
item.dc:creator: Andrew
item.description: that is pretty awesome, loving the 2 tone paint job.
item.content:encoded: that is pretty awesome, loving the 2 tone paint job.
